price: Sai Muka tsĩrar da shi, shi da mutãnensa,* fãce mãtarsa, Mun ƙaddara ta a cikin mãsu wanzuwa.
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرۡنَٰهَا مِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ
footnotes: * Mutãnensa mũminai. Ĩmãni da gaskiya idan gaskiya ta bayyana asĩri ne daga asĩran Allah sai wanda Ya bai wa. Kusanci ga wani Annabi da aure kõ zumunta, bã ya bãyar da shi. Ruwan azãba, shĩ ma asĩri ne na Allah.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu wa-ahlahu illā im'ra-atahu qaddarnāhā mina al-ghābirīna
